examples.example: 我在公交车站耐心地等待着回家的那班车。

translate.english: I am waiting patiently at the bus stop for the bus that goes home.

examples.example: 每天我都会在公交车站期待着新一天的开始。

translate.english: Every day I will wait at the bus stop looking forward to the beginning of a new day.

examples.example: 在公交车站，人们有序地排队上车，展现出良好的文明素养。

translate.english: At the bus stop, people queue up to get on the bus orderly, showing good civilized qualities.
